info.author: Mario César Señoranis Ayal
info.description:
Python Thumbnail
================

Python Thumbnail is a wrapper around multiple image backends that allows
to perform image transformations easily.

Based on sorl-thumbnail it implements a seamless integration with more frameworks 
than just Django.

It also provides a built in command line interface and a wsgi middleware to serve
thumbnails on demand.


Supported integration
=====================

- Django
- Flask
- Tornado
- Pyramid
- Webpy

Support Image Engines
=====================
    
- Pillow
- ImageMagick
- Wand
- pgmagick

Storage Support
===============

- Django Storage Backends
- Filesystem
- S3
info.name: python-thumbnail
info.html_description:
Python Thumbnail

Python Thumbnail is a wrapper around multiple image backends that allows to perform image transformations easily.

Based on sorl-thumbnail it implements a seamless integration with more frameworks than just Django.

It also provides a built in command line interface and a wsgi middleware to serve thumbnails on demand.

Supported integration

  • Django
  • Flask
  • Tornado
  • Pyramid
  • Webpy

Support Image Engines

  • Pillow
  • ImageMagick
  • Wand
  • pgmagick

Storage Support

  • Django Storage Backends
  • Filesystem
  • S3
